EmailTemplate.name: 201804_Global_Email_EGPWS_MK-XXI_mih.201804_Global_Email_EGPWS_MK-XXI_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: MK XXI EGPWS Terrain Database Release Notification - Version 602
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> DearÂ {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Honeywell has released 11 new regional MK XXI EGPWS Terrain Database - version 602. This latest regional terrain database version is an update to the previous version 601 and it adds several new airports, runways and obstacles while improving terrain mapping and resolution. Database download and media creation capability for all EGPWS products now available in the OneNav+ tool, version 1.21.0 or a higher version needed (no license required), additional OneNav+ features are being developed for EGPWS databases and will be available in future releases.
The database can be purchased by visiting Wingman Services <[[https://wingmanservices.bendixking.com/wingman/Home.do]]> (login required). EGPWS change info is located there (no login required), look under news and updates.
If you have any questions, please let us know.
Best regards,
The Honeywell EGPWS Team DSA@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:DSA@Honeywell.com]]>
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>
